attributes.action: Execute repeat rape/murder and paedophile offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Repeat murder,rape or paedophile offenders should be executed upon their 1st repeat conviction.Why release them to a society that they can only cause more harm.They are not wanted nor are they needed by society.Come on politicions! get a backbone and do the right thing to protect the public people and the next generation.Society will not be supporting these parasites clogging up our prisons and wasting taxpayers hard earned money,only to cause more misery and heartbreak to families when re released.Remember! the goverment is supposed to work for the people, not the other way round.Have your say and make yourself heard.
